chamber.chamber_description: A dimly lit cavernous room filled with the sound of goblin chatter and the jingling of coins. At the end of the room, the Goblin King's throne sits atop a mound of gold.

items.item_description: A large, ornate chest filled with gold coins and scrolls of the Goblin King's best dad jokes.

chamber_events.event_description: Adventurer attempted to steal the treasure chest
Goblin King held a feast after successful raid
